metadata.description: Chapterhouse Comics is proud to present Life, Death and Sorcery, an ongoing fantasy quarterly by Toronto-based Danny Zabbal (The First Hero). Follow the story of Amelia, Coco and Winnie, three sisters that run away from home and embark on an amazing adventure. Drama, humor, and magic await in what Bleeding Cool calls "legitimately one of the best books of the year!"
metadata.name: Life, Death & Sorcery
